node.title: Between Two Truths Again
node.description: The Bible often presents truths that appear to be moving in the opposite direction of each yet are not. These truths could be called "twin truths" which when held together in healthy tension, like the strings on a guitar, compliment each other and reveal the perfect will of God. The Christian life has three main biblical tensions at play. What are they, and how can embracing the whole truth not only lead to correct theology but also a real Christian experience?
